member.summary: Returns the cell information for the given location

member.name: P:SnakeLib.GameField.Apples
member.summary: The list of apples visible in the field.

member.name: P:SnakeLib.GameField.Snakes
member.summary: The list of snakes.

member.name: P:SnakeLib.GameField.GrowthRate
member.summary: The number of steps after which the snakes are growing by one

member.name: P:SnakeLib.GameField.AppleFrequency
member.summary: The average number of steps between apples are put in the field. The smaler this number is, the more often will apples appear.

member.name: P:SnakeLib.GameField.MinAppleLife
member.summary: The minimum number of steps while an apple is displayed.

member.name: P:SnakeLib.GameField.MaxAppleLife
member.summary: The maximum number of steps while an apple is displayed.

member.name: P:SnakeLib.GameField.PointsForApple
member.summary: The number of points the snake eating an apple is awarded.

member.name: P:SnakeLib.GameField.WinPoints
member.summary: The player reaching this score wins.

member.name: P:SnakeLib.GameField.XSize
member.summary: The width of the game field

member.name: P:SnakeLib.GameField.YSize
member.summary: The height of the game field

member.name: P:SnakeLib.Snake.Head
member.summary: The position of the head

member.name: P:SnakeLib.Snake.Tail
member.summary: The position of the tail (i.e. the last element of the snake)

member.name: P:SnakeLib.Snake.LastTail
member.summary: The position of the tail as it was in the previous step. It can be null if the snake has just grown or has not moved yet.

member.name: P:SnakeLib.Snake.MovementDirection
member.summary: The direction the snake moved previously. This is null at the first move.

member.name: P:SnakeLib.Snake.Score
member.summary: The current score of the snake

member.name: P:SnakeLib.Snake.Size
member.summary: The current size of the snake

member.name: P:SnakeLib.Snake.Item(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns the given point of the snake. The point at the 0. position is the Head, the point at the last position (Size - 1) is the Tail.
